metadata.title: CVE-2021-39714 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In ion_buffer_kmap_get of ion.c, there is a possible use-after-free due toan integer overflow. This could lead to local escalation of privilege withno additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not neededfor exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-205573273References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
